data.message: Relapse wasn't his best album but it was dope I mean the man still gotta Grammy off da shit plus it was the best mix & mastering I've heard on a album thus far

replies.message: Beautiful is still my favourite song!!

It was such a weird album when it came out.  People were like wtf is wrong with Em and his accent is stupid.  There were even folks saying the only good songs were 3am, beautiful, and underground.  But it took maybe a year for people to enjoy it.  Such a weird time in hip hop.

People weren't listening properly!!

Was and is a worl of art practically the whole project!!
Yes & he managed to still pull a great album out, even at the lowest point of his life
